question: Which of the following is not a fixed cost?
Which of the following is a variable cost?
What does total revenue depend upon?
What is a business doing at the break-even point?
Which of the following is true?

answers.a: Break even point (in quantity) decreases with increase in cost
answers.b: Break even point (in quantity) decreases with increase in selling price
answers.c: Break even point (in sales) decreases with increase in cost
answers.d: Break even point (in sales) decreases with decrease in quantity

question: On a break-even chart, which line does the total revenue line meet at the break-even point?
If the average variable costs Rs. 10, average selling price is Rs. 25 and fixed costs are Rs. 60,000, then what is the break-even output?
